name: Armorines: Project S.W.A.R.M.
description: Human domination or bug infestation? The choice is yours. You're an Armorine. You're equipped with the latest in futuristic battle-armor and packing a devastating arsenal. Your mission is to stop an all-out bug invasion of Earth. Blast armies of alien bugs with hi-tech weapons, including the Laser, Plasma Rifle, and Flamethrower. Know your enemy - they attack from behind, attack in teams and retreat to call reinforcements.
